data.actual_result: On windows, no context menu is shown. On mac, Context menu only shows results for Search with Google, and Copy (Not copy ID)
data.expected_result: Context menu should contain all the normal options for a context menu on a message, as well as the options for right clicking a guild member.
data.short_description: In embeds: Context menu for user mentions doesn't work as it should
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a embed that contains user mentions - Right click user mentions
